result.title: Estimate of the human exposure to MP via food and drinking water

result.title: Benchmarking report on the performance of polymers
result.description: The report will synthesise the finding on the toxicity (WP2) and the degradability (WP3) of the materials investigated in LimnoPlast. It will define key parameters for the assessment and benchmark the polymers’ environmental performance accordingly.

result.title: Legal framework of freshwater MP
result.description: The report will provide an evaluation of the legal framework relevant for freshwater MP on an international and European level including global and regional instruments. This will include an analysis of the legal content, nature of legal force, and potential regulatory gaps.
